name: api_openTicket
description: This command creates a new ticket in our system.

function.name: api_openTicket
function.desc: This command creates a new ticket in our system.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

product.name: product
product.description: the product/service if any this is in reference to.

body.name: body
body.example: This is a sample ticket body

example.status_text: Invalid Email Address - Does not match your account email!

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param user_email string client email address
* @param user_ip string client ip address
* @param subject string subject of the ticket
* @param product string the product/service if any this is in reference to.
* @param body string full content/description for the ticket
* @param box_auth_value string encryption string?
